speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Mr Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. n't heard: Did Eric Schmidt jump ship, or was he forced to walk the plank? He Jumped Eric Schmidt has "career aspirations outside of Google," says Bianca Bosker at The Huffington Post. Some speculate Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman only temporarily before pursuing a career in the public sector, a field in which he has previously demonstrated interest.
